ygData.subject: Re: hello? :)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yep, I also just got 29. Nice too feel needed with your group Teles. :) I have not had any problem with fizzles since about level 16, so I m using Inferno
ygData.messageBody:
Lim Dul wrote:
>
> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> Why is everyone so quiet lately? Trying to finish that dumb quest for the
> cloak? hehe. Has anyone done it yet? I think it's really no big deal so
> I'm not sweating it yet, but it would be a nice accomplishment to do it
> anyway. I think I'm going to pass up the extra AC and just try for that
> Molten Cloak instead.
>
> By the way, 29th level is one heck of a fun set of spells. I'm not using
> the DD yet as they tend to fizzle still, but we can cast those frost shock
> spells with impunity it seems. And until it gets old, thse group teleports
> are fun to play with. They make it easy to get some quick cash or some free
> buffs.
>

Yep, I also just got 29. Nice too feel needed with your group Teles. :)

I have not had any problem with fizzles since about level 16, so I'm
using Inferno Shock and loving it. I don't know what good Thunder Strike
is, though. Is it just useless?

Too bad I failed all my research attempts for level 29 spells. But I
think I'll probably keep using column of Lightning as my AE anyway.

--
Sergey

Worker bees can leave
Even drones can fly away
The queen is their slave
